solution_line_template: He has {num_contracts} contracts that are {pages_per_contract} pages each so that's {num_contracts}*{pages_per_contract} = <<{num_contracts}*{pages_per_contract}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages
He can only shred {shredder_capacity} pages at a time so it will take him {total_pages}/{shredder_capacity} = <<{total_pages}/{shredder_capacity}={shredding_times}>>{shredding_times} units
